definitions: To be accepted into a place, group, or institution.
To submit or deliver something by a deadline.
To enter a place, especially a vehicle or building.
To become involved in a situation or activity.
examples: What time did you get in last night?
She was so happy to get in to her dream university.
Make sure you get your application in by Friday.
Quick, get in the car before it starts raining.
He always manages to get in trouble.
